import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const spotifyAuthEndpoint = "https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize" const redirectUri = "http://localhost:3000" const clientID = 'e74be6c70b214c6a89ffc0bb76ddd005' const scopes = [ "user-read-playback-state", "user-read-recently-played", "user-read-currently-playing", "user-top-read", "user-modify-playback-state", "user-follow-modify", "user-follow-read", "user-library-modify", ] const Login = () => { return (
Login To Spotify
) } export default Login
